alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HARRISON... NORTHWESTERN GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON...NORTHERN MUSKINGUM...SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL AND TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wilmot to near Farmerstown to near Danville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Uhrichsville, Newcomerstown, Dennison, Strasburg, West Lafayette, Sugarcreek, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Gnadenhutten, Tuscarawas, Baltic, Midvale, Warsaw, Port Washington, Barnhill, Conesville, and Roswell. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 50 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Muskingum; Tuscarawas
